titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress should provide increased Federal funding for continued type 1 diabetes research.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
1/8/2009--Introduced.
Calls for an increase in federal funding for diabetes research to meet the goals of the National Institutes of Health (NIH) so that a cure for type 1 diabetes can be found.
